tool_description: Manages document access permissions and authorization for signing workflows, validating user permissions and document security settings.

document_path.description: Path to the document to check access for

requested_action.description: Action being requested: read, write, sign, or admin

audit_logging.description: Enable audit logging for access attempts

error_messages: Access denied: User does not have permission for the requested action on this document.
Authentication required: Valid session token or credentials must be provided.
MFA required: Multi-factor authentication is required but not provided.
Document locked: Document is currently locked by another user or process.
Permission rules violation: Access request violates one or more permission rules.
Invalid user: User ID is not recognized in the system.
Invalid action: Requested action is not supported or recognized.
usage: Provide document_path, user_id, and requested_action. Configure additional security requirements using permission_rules, require_mfa, and audit_logging. Include session_token for authenticated requests.

access_granted.description: Whether access is granted for the requested action

permission_level.description: User's permission level for this document

restrictions.description: Any restrictions or limitations on access

audit_id.description: Audit log entry identifier for this access attempt
